item.description:
Please RSVP on the Meetup.com website!

Welcome to the Boston Atheists' - Boston Poetry Halloween Party. The theme this year is "Irreligious Beings and Concepts." Come as your favorite, most irreligious being, irreligious beast, irreligious personality, irreligious concept, or combine them for an irreligious beastly concept! E.g. (god, goddess, fictional deity, demon, irreverent or farcical being, etc.)

The event will be held on the second floor of Boston Beer Works, Canal Street, downtown.

Mix, mingle, grab your beer of choice, eat, make some noise, and enjoy nachos on the house as you engage your imaginative brains and blow us away with your irreligion!

Prizes will be award to best costume by popular vote. $5 to enter the contest. All attendees encouraged to vote.

$50 CASH PRIZE to best costume
$25 GIFT CERTIFICATE THINKGEEK for second place
and finally,
HONORABLE MENTION CERTIFICATE for the most uninteresting costume

Â
item.name: Heathens Halloween Party!
